page.description: Gets the full field name (Table and Field).
page.discussion: The .FULLNAME_GET() method returns the fully qualified (i.e., prefixed with an alias) Field_Name of a field referenced by using the object pointer. For example, " customer->lastname ". Contrast this with the <FIELD>.NAME_GET() method that returns just the field name without an alias prefix.

section.title: Example
section.description: Show the field names in the current table.
section.example: dim tbl as P dim f_handle as P tbl = table.current() no_fields = tbl.fields_get() for i = 1 to no_fields f_handle = tbl.field_get(i) f_name = f_handle.fullname_get() trace.writeln("Fieldname " + ltrim( str(i) ) + ": " + f_name) next
